**Summary**
• NASA’s climate satellites are on the chopping block thanks to the GOP.
• These satellites track Earth’s energy balance and ocean health—vital shit.
• Killing them would be beyond stupid, like trashing tools we need to survive.

Impact — Losing these satellites would blind us to climate changes, putting the planet at even greater risk.

────────────────────────────────
